Trainers

Prebon was thinking about his puppet master plan, when it came to 
him! Communicate with the Maximal leader. Have a private, no aid talk 
with the leader about exchanging the hostages for something. Than he 
takes the leader by surprise and insert the chip, giving Prebon rule 
of the Maximals! Yes, that would do greatly....

The others pulled Striker out of the CR Chamber.

"He'll wake up when he's ready. He's fixed enough for now."

They carried him down to the brig section, and placed him in a 
special cell. One of those with the big steel doors and only a little 
eye panelt that can be moved on the outside. They escorted him in and 
cuffed his hands and feet to the wall. This bot was in for the worst 
experience of his life.
______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream followed Zardus, shaking his head. He could tell Zardus 
didn't care about Megatron. But he would soon enough. He only hoped 
that Phobia listened to his mutiny speech.

______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Brix and Fliq did everything in their power to keep the ship steady.

"Come on Ramulus, we gotta hurry!"

The descended more, not exacly falling, but not exactly peaceful 
either. They passed through all the clouds....and then it was there.

"The Ark.....and everybody's outside. All welcoming us."

"Maybe, or they had another battle. But we can fix The Ark now. One 
problem."

"What's that?"

"I don't know if I can land this baby. Ramulus, keep putting the fire 
out. I'll try my best."
